Package vendingmachine

Class VendingMachineModel

java.lang.Object
vendingmachine.VendingMachineModel
public class VendingMachineModel extends Object
The VendingMachineModel represents the business layer of the vending machine factory and the individual vending machines that will be created. It contains methods for creating two different types of vending machines - regular and special, testing features, and handling other related functionalities.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    VendingMachineModel()
    Constructs a VendingMachineModel regular and special vending machines created, each with 8 item slots.

      public void addItem(Item[] itemSlots, int[] salesTracker, int[] startingInventory, int slotNumber, Item item)
      Adds an item to a specific slot in the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      itemSlots - the array representing the item slots in the vending machine
      salesTracker - the number of sales for each item in the the vending machine
      startingInventory - the initial inventory of the vending machine
      slotNumber - the slot number where the item will be added
      item - item to be added
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the item is null

      slotNumber - the slot number to check

    • findClosestDenominationIndex

      public int findClosestDenominationIndex(int[] banknote, double n)
      Finds the closest smaller denomination relative to the given amount. This method takes a parameter 'n' and iterates through the 'banknotes' array to find a denomination closely smaller than or equal to n. The loop begins from the highest denomination at the last index and moves down until it finds an element that meets this criteria. That element is then returned.
      Parameters:
      banknote - the array representing the denomination of banknotes
      n - the given number
      Returns:
      the index of the closest denomination

    • isChangeEnough

      public boolean isChangeEnough(int[] banknote, int[] banknoteCounter, int change)
      Checks if there are sufficient banknote denominations in the machine to generate change. This method iteratively calls the 'findClosestDenominationIndex()' method and calculates the quantity of banknotes required for generating change. If there is enough quantity of banknotes, it subtracts the deducted change from the original change due and this process repeats until the remaining change to dispense is 0. Otherwise, it returns false.
      Parameters:
      banknote - the array representing the denomination of banknotes
      banknoteCounter - the array that stores how much of each denomination is available
      change - the amount of change due
      Returns:
      true if there is enough change, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the 'banknote' and 'banknoteCounter'arrays have different lengths

    • checkOutofStock

      public boolean checkOutofStock(Item[] itemSlots, int selectedSlot)
      Checks if an item slot in the vending machine has a quantity of 0.
      Parameters:
      itemSlots - the array representing the item slots in the vending machine
      selectedSlot - the index of the slot to check
      Returns:
      true if the selected slot is out of stock, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the 'selectedSlot' is invalid

    • computePayment

      public double computePayment(int[] payment, int[] banknoteCounter, int[] earnings)
      Breaks down payment into denomination and finds total.
      Parameters:
      payment - the arrays that stores the quantity of each denomination that was recevied as payment
      banknoteCounter - the array that stores how much of each denomination is available
      earnings - the array that stores the amount of each denomination received from transactions
      Returns:
      the total payment
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the 'payment' array has a length different from 9

    • dispenseItem

      public void dispenseItem(Item[] itemSlots, int[] salesTracker, int selectedSlot, double total, double totalAmountCollected)
      Dispenses the item from the vending machine and updates the quantity, sales tracker, and totalAmountCollected after successful transaction.
      Parameters:
      itemSlots - the array representing the item slots in the vending machine
      salesTracker - the number of sales for each item in the the vending machine
      selectedSlot - the index of the slot from which to dispense item
      total - the total of the current transaction being processed
      totalAmountCollected - the total sales accumulated by the vending machine
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the 'selectedSlot' is invalid

    • refundPayment

      public void refundPayment(int[] banknoteCounter, int[] payment)
      Refunds payment back to the customer by adjusting the 'banknoteCounter' array.
      Parameters:
      banknoteCounter - the array that stores how much of each denomination is available
      payment - the arrays that stores the quantity of each denomination that was recevied as payment
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the 'payment' array has a length different from 9.
      ArithmeticException - if any of the quantities in the 'payment' array exceeds the corresponding quantities in the 'banknoteCounter' array.

    • editPrice

      public void editPrice(Item[] itemSlots, int selectedSlot, double newPrice)
      Edits the price of an item in the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      itemSlots - the array representing the item slots in the vending machine
      selectedSlot - the index in item slots whose price is to be edited
      newPrice - the new price for the selected item
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the 'selectedSlot' is invalid

    • restockItem

      public void restockItem(int selectedSlot, int restockQuantity, int[] startingInventory, int[] salesTracker, Item[] itemSlots, double totalAmountCollected)
      Restocks an item in the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      selectedSlot - the index in item slots to be restocked
      restockQuantity - the quantity to restock for the selected item
      startingInventory - the initial inventory of the vending machine
      salesTracker - the number of sales for each item in the the vending machine
      itemSlots - the array representing the item slots in the vending machine
      totalAmountCollected - the total sales accumulated by the vending machine
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the 'selectedSlot' is invalid

    • copyRecords

      public void copyRecords(int[] tempInventory, int[] startingInventory, int[] tempSalesTracker, int[] salesTracker, double tempAmountCollected, double totalAmountCollected, Item[] itemSlots)
      Copies the records of the vending machine to temporary storage including the 'startingInventory', 'salesTracker', and totalAmountCollected.
      Parameters:
      tempInventory - the array that stores a copy of the starting inventory
      startingInventory - the initial inventory of the vending machine
      tempSalesTracker - the array that stores a temporary copy of sales tracker
      salesTracker - the number of sales for each item in the the vending machine
      tempAmountCollected - double that temporarily stores the totalAmountCollected
      totalAmountCollected - the total sales accumulated by the vending machine
      itemSlots - the array representing the item slots in the vending machine
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the length of 'tempInventory' or 'tempSalesTracker' is different from the length of 'itemSlots'.

    • collectPayment

      public boolean collectPayment(int[] earnings, int[] banknote, double totalAmountCollected)
      Collects or dispenses earnings from the machine.
      Parameters:
      earnings - the array that stores the amount of each denomination received from transactions
      banknote - the array representing the denomination of banknotes
      totalAmountCollected - the total sales accumulated by the vending machine
      Returns:
      true if there are earnings, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the length of 'earnings' or 'banknote' is different from the number of banknote denominations.

      Parameters:

    • computeSpecialPrice

      public double computeSpecialPrice(Item[] itemSlots, Item[] ingredients, int[] tempRegularItems, int[] tempSpecialItems)
      Computes the price of the customized product in the special vending machine based on its ingredients.
      Parameters:
      itemSlots - the array representing the item slots in the vending machine
      ingredients - an array that contains the ingredients of the pizza that are not individually sold
      tempRegularItems - an array that stores whether any of the regular items were selected by the user
      tempSpecialItems - an array that stores whether any of the regular items were selected by the user
      Returns:
      the total price of the special product

    • printSummary

      public String printSummary(Item[] itemSlots, int[] startingInventory, int[] salesTracker, double totalAmountCollected)
      Generates a formatted string to print a summary of sales beginning from the last restock. The summary includes the starting inventory, quantity sold for each item, and the current or ending inventory.
      Parameters:
      itemSlots - the array representing the item slots in the vending machine
      startingInventory - the initial inventory of the vending machine
      salesTracker - the number of sales for each item in the the vending machine
      totalAmountCollected - the total sales accumulated by the vending machine
      Returns:
      the sales summary as a formatted string

    • prepCustomizedPizza

      public String prepCustomizedPizza(Item[] itemSlots, Item[] ingredients, int[] allSelectedItems)
      Generates a formatted string detailing the preparation of the customized pizza.
      Parameters:
      itemSlots - the array representing the item slots in the vending machine
      ingredients - an array that contains the ingredients of the pizza that are not individually sold
      allSelectedItems - an array representing that stores both the regular and special items chosen
      Returns:
      the step-by-step preparation as a formatted string
